channel.title: CGI Email
channel.description: Does anybody know how to set up cgi email? I have already written the form and template out but I am getting an internal server error when I try to send a message via cgi email

item.title: CGI Email
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:2, topic:434069”]internal server errors are usually a permission problem with CGI, really you should just use PHP form mail.[/quote]I was going to just do a php form at first but then I was told by a friend that a lot of bots will use your form for spam so I was going to try to secure it some. ( no idea if cgi is any securer but a friend said it was)

Read full topic
